overview.address: Indian Institute of Technology Palakkad, Kanjikode, Kerala - 678623

mode_of_admission.mode_of_admission: Candidates must qualify the JEE (Main) exam and then appear for the JEE (Advanced) exam.

fee_waiver.point 1: 100% Tuition Fee waiver for SC/ST/PwD students.
fee_waiver.point 2: 100% Tuition Fee remission for Most Economically Backward students with family income less than ₹1 lakh per annum.
fee_waiver.point 3: 2/3rd Tuition Fee remission for Other Economically Backward students with family income between ₹1 lakh to ₹5 lakh per annum.
